lines.text: There's a third one down that way that's maybe about 30 feet away from you that is heading your direction. It's up to you if you want to pursue that or come help out your friends.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm going to go for this one here. I should have enough speed to clear it, 40 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you should. Yeah, you can easily get there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pop, pop. Okay, so first attack. 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to spend a ki point to stun this thing, and hopefully it doesn't save again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a six, a five plus one. It does not save.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's stunned! Finally!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, right. Oh god, I rolled a one in damage. So that's plus four, five damage. I'm so nervous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's your first strike?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, my brain is all over the place. 12 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. The first strike ends up as just enough to cut past its defenses to stun it. As it's reeling from the impact, your other blow, crack! with your staff to the side, hits it, and part of its armor cracks inward, exposing more of its tender underbelly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, and then I am going to spend another ki point and do extract aspects.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you want to learn three things from it. What do you want to learn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three things, okay. What is its dexterity modifier, or its dexterity saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dexterity saving throw is zero. Plus zero.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Sorry. Dex zero. What is its constitution saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it have any vulnerabilities?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No vulnerabilities.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I still have a bonus attack, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still have a bonus attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, wow. The suspense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Technically, your attacks have advantage while it's stunned, so you get to roll again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's right! That's even worse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does not hit. Even while stunned, you swing back with your fist, and your knuckles glide off of part of the armor that is still hardened, and it hurts your knuckles and you pull back a second, but it's not immediately able to do anything back at you. That's your turn, I believe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I yell to everybody and be like: These guys don't seem very quick and shifty!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not too dex-y or anything. They seem clumsy as fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It has shitty dexterity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, you're up next.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try something fancy. I'm going to tap my new fancy sword, and I'm going to, like a Pepper's ghost effect, fade out and disappear, and move right into what would be-- get some advantage on the one that Beau's been hitting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 30, so you're just out of range of it, but you can use your movement to move up to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll use my movement to get right where I need to be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I have advantage now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. You watch as Molly fades out of existence and then appears, Nightcrawler teleport-style right behind Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They killed Molly!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take two attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. First one, a natural one and an 18, yeah, so one hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh! That's ten damage plus three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 13 damage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's nine plus two, so that's 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage. All right, that'll do it. With that, you teleport next to it and carve it asunder. It screams as you slice through it all three times, and you bisect it in the center of where its thorax begins. Falls to the ground and crumples into pieces, its greenish blood spilling into the dirt and floor of the forest underbrush.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Clink! Take her staff and clink weapons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we have a little clink, and turn and face the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, ends Molly's turn. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, do I have any movement left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. You have 25 feet of movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right there, to make a wall there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you are way off that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm looking through the window of the house, the homestead, and I'm 100 feet away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're about 100 feet away, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's nothing I can do. I'll start walking towards the fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 30 feet. You could dash as a bonus action, if you wanted to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that'll take me 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does seem to lose your stealth, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could be low in the brush, but you're not moving quiet, carefully.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say at that point, that'll get you about to the edge of the board there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, you might be able to-- oh, you burned your move, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is Keg? Did I just run past Keg on my way?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm on a horse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keg is going to be catching up to you at this point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I hold my action until Keg gets in range? You're on a horse?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I jumped on a horse. Before we rolled initiative, real fast-like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll hold my action until someone gets within melee range of the thing, and then I will fire a crossbow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Got you. That ends Nott's turn. It's now their turn. As one of them that previously killed Beau's horse--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Rest in peace, Water Closet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To that side there. Another one bursts from the ground--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aw, come on! This is not fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, no, because you killed the fourth one, so it's not present. As they all turn around and, watching its one friend get cut down, they begin to line up, all three of them pull back and its pincers open as it releases this splashing stream of deep green-like liquid that sprays out in front of it, for 30 feet, five foot wide.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not anything I can try and give them disadvantage on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, this is a saving throw scenario. I need Molly and Caleb to make dexterity-- actually, for this one, it's just Molly and the horse, because it doesn't quite get to Caleb on that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dexterity saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay! That's a 22!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take seven points of acid damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can live with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it streaks across your body. Your horse does not make the saving throw. Your horse gets sprayed on the side and makes a horrible, pained neighing sound as it falls to the ground, its body now acidically burning away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Loo! No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not surviving this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the end of Loo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now we're down to John, Crapper, and Toilet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one right here is going to spray you as well, Molly. Another dexterity saving throw, please.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I really hope Toilet makes it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 does not succeed. You suffer 14 points of acid damage as another stream blasts into your back and shoulder, burning through your flesh, and the side of your face begins to pull away and smoke. Back here, this one is going to shoot in a stream that hits Beau, Caleb, and the horse. I need you to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I use my natural 20 now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dex saves?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dex save, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That time it's a three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your horse made it, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Crapper!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 14 points of acid damage to both of you. The horse takes seven. It's hurt, still surviving. That's going to end their go. It's now the horses' turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The horses' turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got worse initiative than the horse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one's running. Yep. And it's going to run off the battlefield there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Run, Crapper, run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Run like the wind!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb and Keg, you guys are up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, guests first.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, thank you. So how far can I go on this horse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On horseback?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a fairly good distance speed of 60 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll get you up to... we'll say up to there. Pretty much right to the edge of where that is there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I can't get up on any of these boys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say because a horse doesn't get any attack on-- and it would normally get an action, I'll let the horse dash.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ey!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that'll get you right up next to this one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. So can I leap off the horse and come down with the axe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Just for the hell of it, make an acrobatics check for me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay! Why not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What could possibly go wrong?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's like Cirque du Soleil shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as the horse is galloping, you watch--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She goes like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Keg gets up on top, holding the reins. (hoofbeats) Pulls the warhammer out and then at the right moment just leaps off while pulling the battleaxe out, doing a flip in the air, landing and coming down with both weapons. Go ahead and make your attacks on the opposite side of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 hits.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then the other attack is an 18 naturally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. So go ahead and roll both those damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So that's six... and then help me do math, 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six and 12?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. Still have your bonus action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I get to attack again, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because you're dual wielding. So you attack, attack, and then attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Eight plus seven. Does that hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. Still hits.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Armor class of...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage. Oof! So as you come down, both weapons (whack) clanging onto it, you hear the armor crack from underneath and you watch as its light green blood begin to seep through the wounds you left. As it turns around, this weird clicking, sucking sound out of its face, you laugh--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shut up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --and slam it in the side of the face with your warhammer. (screech) It pulls back and it's now bleeding out of its jaw as it looks pretty hurt.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will release my bolt. At disadvantage because more than 30 feet away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (inhale through teeth) Ooh, that's only a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 misses, unfortunately. (ping) The bolt streaks off-- actually, it hits the side of Keg's armor--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shearing off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, sorry! That's-- that's on me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who are you aiming for?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did not--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's nine feet tall!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry! I'm just drunk. I'm drunk, I'm day drunk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is your perfect opportunity for "New crossbow, who dis?" (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, I got a new crossbow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I go rummaging through my pack really quick and I pull out a licorice root and stick it into my mouth and bite onto and I start muttering to myself and I say, "Pick up the pace," and I cast Haste on Beauregard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, I hate licorice. (groaning) Why is that taste in my mouth? That's weird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then I will move as far as I can towards Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you are Hasted there. You're going to move as far as you can to Nott.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Towards Nott, ja.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn. Top of the round, Beau you're up and hasted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (panting) I'm going to turn to this guy and I'm going to lay into him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You step around the trunk of the tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So that means, do I get three attacks? Base attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get three base attacks, correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Woo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singing) Haste. (hits)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (hits) First one!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Advantage on dex saves too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And advantage on dex saves. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It will come in handy with these--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh. Yeah, yeah. that's 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that is... 11 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. Third strike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, that'll hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Seven damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you still have your bonus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep and I'm going to spend a ki point again to do flurry of blows and get two more attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hasted monks. (blows) Just full on Wang Chung over here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm. One's a natural 19, the other's a two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you do get one more hit. So roll damage for that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, yeah! 11 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, ten damage. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right in the ball sack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he dead? (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as she basically pummels this giant nine foot insect creature into submission.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (hits)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It falls to the ground as you're just pummelling its face until it eventually collapses and sputters out the remaining breath before it stops moving.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Street Fighter combo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Epic combo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic. You still have...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, movement!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 75 feet of movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Holy cow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because you're fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you're hasted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a fresh one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am going to make my way behind this guy... if I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (car zoom)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go around the tree and then tap it on the shoulder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Circle the tree a couple times, holding onto it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just to be a dick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Singing in the rain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That finishes your turn, Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Molly, you're up next.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run and get into flanking position with this one over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thumpety, thumpety.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So move over and push into this space--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it's an ally, I'll let you move into the horse's space there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And now we're going to take a slice at this one. And that's... that'll do it. (counting) 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So. (counting) Ten plus four, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of damage, nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And again. 19 and a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why I love advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Advantage is nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's... 14 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: ASHLEY, MATT
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's got to be dead by now, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How is that-- the one that... really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one hadn't taken any damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It had!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh wait, no! Oh sorry. I was writing that down under the wrong one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (explosions, screeching)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My apologies. Yes, it is dead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was writing it under the wrong one. So as you dart off behind, the first two strikes you unleash carve it into two pieces. You watch as the creature, as it's turning around to hiss and rear back, its pincers about to carve into your face, you watch as the head just rolls off of its body and there behind you see Molly standing there with the blades out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I needed this. And I'm going to hide behind the tree trunk from the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're going to-- right there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Last of my movement. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That finishes your go, Molly. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The inner range is what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just out of your 30 range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you know what? I'll stay put and I will cast... I will cast Silent Image in a flanking position to Beau. And I will create a second Beau just standing there in front of the creature and try to help Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So mysteriously...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a different color palette? Color palette swaps.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's Street Fighter-style.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. All right, so. As the image of Beau appears before, just standing there quietly shifting, holding its space.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'll bonus action hide, just behind that little--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use your movement to go behind and then hide if you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! This is cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You teleport through campaigns. You're somehow in campaign one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That finishes Nott's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not as emotionally deep as this one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give it time, give it time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nice patronus, by the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Time travel too far.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's now that guy's turn. Currently surrounded by Beaus--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Too many Beaus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolls a natural 19. So even with its low intelligence, it can discern the nature of which--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Really? Puce? It's going to go ahead and make a bite attack towards you, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 12 to hit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to go ahead and duck out of the side and slam your bo into it, causing it to just completely miss you. It rears back. It does not regain its acid spray and that's its turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. That's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both horses just go running off the board into the fray. Or away from the fray.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have oats, they'll come back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to Keg.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I get there with the 25 feet speed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Delightful. I'm going to smack him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I won't smack him. I'll try again to smack him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will smack him. And then I'm going to do nine damage to that boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine damage to that one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: As a bonus action, I'll smack him again. I will smack him, and then I'll smack him one more time, and that's going to be seven damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using that opening, you pull back with your battleaxe and jam it into the wound, carving in deeper. It's looking pretty hurt, but it's still standing. Anything else you wanted to do in your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I'm going to hang.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to hang back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to keg stand there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to keg stand there. I'm proud of you, Sam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what happens when you get Emmy award winners at the table. You get that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's the height that we can accomplish though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's about it. You've peaked at this point, we're done after this. It's all downhill.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's horses around, there might be a pony keg at some point, I don't know. We're going to work on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel the wind and then shoot three Magic Missiles out of my hand at the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you finish your attacks, you glance over your shoulder as you hear this sound. You look in the distance; you see Caleb-- who at this point has been this dirty hobo in the background-- all of a sudden, fire these three mystical arcane missiles that glow and arc off anime-missile style, through the woods, avoiding trees, and all three slamming into the sides of this creature. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a four and also (counting) six-- I've got to change this dice, that is a ten total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten total. (multiple impacts) It sits there for a second after the impact, leaving these large craters in the side of its chitinous armor where it's cracked and bits of liquid are spilling out of it. It looks heavily wounded, but it's still alive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was ist los?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to stay where you're put?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will go crouch by Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Revealing her position.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey! Get away from me! No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't make any noise. I just sit down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First attack. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That just hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, no, 13. Sorry, my math is wonky today. That doesn't hit, does it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 does not hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no advantage because my Silent Image is there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, no. Nothing is actually flanking it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second attack. That hits, that's 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is-- what did I roll on that one? I forgot. I don't know what it was. Sorry, 15 damage for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of damage on the first hit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, how do you want to do this? As you and Keg are both there clamoring on two sides of it, the image of yourself on the opposite end, what do you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As I see Keg bash it in a little bit of its insect armor, I take my staff and I get up under its exoskeleton and I start prying it off and I punch it to death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you crowbar off a large part of its exterior insectoid armor skeleton, it exposes this horrible yellowish, sinewy muscle interior as all the striations are pulling off of the armor. As it's exposed, it tries to go in to protect itself, but you're too quick, and you zero in and plunge your fist into its body as it falls to the ground with a horrible sucking, guttural, slimy death and pull it out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you squeeze and twist, you can make it stand up again and you can make the arms move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Hello my baby!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You guys nasty, I like it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does anybody have a Wet-Nap?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Use the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to take off running after the horses to see if I can catch up with them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Please check on Water Closet!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a dead horse or can it be revived?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go ahead and make a medicine check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make a medicine check for my horse.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it have Jester's shield on it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't we leave the shield?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the shield was strapped onto one of the horses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My medicine check is nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure but it looks dire.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, if you want to go ahead and step up to the horse. Make a medicine check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless this horse gets some serious treatment, it's done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's suffering, put it down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I take my axe and I slam it down on its neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Instantly mercy killed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Neigh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They slowed down and once they got a safe distance from the action-- you manage to recover two of them. There's still your horse by the house; you still have three horses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Check Water Closet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: John, Crapper, and Toilet. Water Closet's dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, he's very dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Water Closet is possibly new pocket jerky at this point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can go check Water Closet I guess?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a medicine check as you approach.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Water Closet looks not long for this world.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to cut out the tongue. Maybe that's something I can eat later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Water Closet is still technically holding onto life.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh. I don't know that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Water Closet's final horrible moment is its riders cutting its tongue out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sobbing)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why do you hang out with this guy-- lady.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He came up with this one; they were a package deal.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why do you hang out with it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She is extremely useful.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: At cutting out horse tongues?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (eating noises)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Among other things, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's the most fucked-up shit I've ever seen, and I grew up in Shadycreek Run.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have three horses, and there's five of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we double up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's possible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott doubles up with Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe the two smalls should--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm not going on a horse with her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? I've bonded with its essence now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm not going on a horse with her!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keg can ride with me, this is not a problem. If you want.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, that's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got the booze.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know, for the first time in my life, I'm willing to sacrifice booze--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scared straight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Scared straight. You can take that shit on the road.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're already taking a good hard look at your decisions. This is good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys begin to try and work out your arrangements and the horses, unfortunately, due to the heavy nature of your armor and the broad form and heavy body of Keg, it looks like you won't be able to fit Keg and one other individual on a horse. But there are other combinations that might work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott, team up with Caleb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll ride with you then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would that work?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get your own horse.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can me and Molly team up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You and Molly can do it, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have their armor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we have three-- yeah, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that'll do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keg's about as dense as two of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I noticed back there that you were using your hands and weapon stuff and things. You're not a healer or anything?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You cracked the case, my man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Truly nothing escapes your astute observation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't have any potions of healing or anything that could maybe heal someone if anyone needing healing would--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who needs healing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No one now, but in the future-- it's a frequent occurrence for us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Going to go back to that cabin and take a short rest for a minute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do any of us have any potions?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a potion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a potion. I start to look to see what Jester's got inside the haversack other than the dodecahedron and our tent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless I am mistaken--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She had a Greater Healing potion, however, I don't know if she had that on her or kept it in the sack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would have been in the sack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She had a Heroes' Feast in there, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and check one element of this because it will--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we have her notebook in the locker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want me to go look at the locker?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, her notebook might even be--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I felt around in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it might be in the locker then.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What time is it now, after all the bug-battling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The battle was pretty quick. You still have probably another hour and a half, two hours, before sundown.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Of daylight? Is there anything to harvest from those bugs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to go ahead and take a shot at trying--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did the light just change in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was in battle mode, did you notice?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh, fancy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Look at the fancy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The light is moving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: New toys.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: New toys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've wanted to have a setup like that since high school. And now I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It can be used for anything that would involve a very strong piece of cord or rope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What about their acidic venom situation, their venom sacs?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb comes up behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That could possibly be harvested. It's a dangerous process, you can certainly try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like I might die trying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, you can certainly try. It's trying to carefully remove a giant sac of natural acid from a creature's body. You want to roll the dice?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you feeling lucky, punk?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on. Here, there's the dodecahedron.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to remove it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just stare back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as they pull this pack out and Beau, reaching in, pulls out this strange, 12-sided construction. It looks like it's some sort of an opaque crystal, almost like a marble type of color. It's grayish and it's undulating with some slight pulsing light, like a faint heartbeat, with these golden handles affixed to it. As she pulls it out and begins to focus on it, there's this moment of distant meditation before she comes back with a breath and places it back in. It's a strange sight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're all into some freaky shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Made by gnomes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have a blade to harvest?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a dagger. Here, use mine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do have a dagger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I shoot out the globules of light to float around the corpse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I put my goggles on. Safety first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's very bright. Super bright.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Super bright right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take my scarf from around my waist and tie it around me for a facemask.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can do this, and I walk twenty feet back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say, because of your understanding of its body from extracting the aspects of it, do you wish to utilize nature or medicine for this roll? Giving you the choice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Medicine, it's higher.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make your check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a straight check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a straight check. Skill check with medicine bonus, whatever that may be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: ASHLEY, TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Finally!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen Beau be pretty precise in combat and pinpointing the weak elements of an opponent's body. This is almost poetry. The surgical precision in which Beauregard takes the dagger and cuts, pulls, rips, pulls and lifts. Tucks, finds, cuts, removes, and within a matter of about a minute, a minute and a half, there is a sac about the size of a basketball-- the ends have been tied off and feels like a water balloon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Keg is aroused.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Got the sac, now what? Do you have any more flasks or anything to put it in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a couple of empty vials, but they're small. I've worked with chemicals before, I could try to put this acid in the vials and stopper them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we poke-- if you have a little tube or something that is straw, a little bamboo straw, put it in there, and go down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Would three vials of acid be useful to us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it would be useful to you for sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, all right. I'll try to make a little needle prick in the bladder and try to pour them into these vials that I got from The Gentleman.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I help with my natural 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a dexterity check, just a straight dexterity check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. That's 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's good. You do not just puncture a balloon while looking directly at it. You manage to find one of the areas that taper within this organ, whatever it is that was removed, and manage to siphon it off in a way where you can fill the rest of your vials, however many empty vials you have.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have three from The Gentleman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You have three vials of acid now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Great. Would you like one? You did this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think they're better to be used on your bolts and things like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how I would put it on there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can't he--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's more of a tossed weapon or used to dissolve things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you take one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'll take one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Molly, do you want some acid? Do you want to drop some acid?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like if you give it to me, I'm going to end up dropping it and it's not really going to be that useful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, do you want--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're far more dexterous than I.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about I'll give you two, and I'll keep one since I already have one that I made.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You didn't ask me if I wanted some acid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you dexterous?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Show us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's acrobatics, but fuck it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd say she earned one, yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Here you go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we friends again?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Were we ever? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm very happy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have taken a short time-- it's taken about half an hour or so for you to go through this process of extracting that and carefully filling these vials and discussing amongst yourselves who would get what. You have about an hour until dusk hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we just camp at the house, at this point. I need rest and we have... Not going to get much further.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's fine with me. You guys fine with that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Short rest, you said? Sorry, was reading my book.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we wake up early. It's going to be dusk in less than an hour.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The house feels a little exposed to me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Plus all the weird buggy guys were around there. If there are more, they would come back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, did we get any horses? Just enough to fit us all on, condensed, right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What time is it? Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About an hour until dusk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, well, we can make some more headway on the road and then go at full dark. We could camp at full dark.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wherever we happen to find ourselves.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we within range of the forests?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right on the edge of the forest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we should continue to make time as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Can I climb a tree and do I see anything on the horizon in where we're going, like another tree clearing that looks like it might be up ahead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Athletics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Rolled an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like a monkey that was raised in the jungle, you watch Beauregard leap from branch to bough, effortlessly diving through this forest.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Keg is aroused.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whatever you cast on me, Caleb, is like... I feel so good!

lines.name: MATT, LIAM
lines.text: It's gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But the lingering effects, you know, I'm in the afterglow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The afterglow of Haste.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Herbal tea, man. Just chamomile tea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So relaxed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make it up into the canopy. Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see elements of stone that have broken through bits of the grass and open fields, part of the natural fields here. You haven't actually traveled this far north, so it's unfamiliar topography to you-- you've only heard about it-- but it's interesting to see that the further north you get, the more rocky the terrain seems to get in the direction you're traveling. You do see, far in the distance, what could possibly be the road that you're getting to, but it's a ways off to get to that direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I climb back down. I say we gather some branches, some scrap wood for firewood, in case this might be the only forest we come across in a while. See as far as we can get, maybe we can hide under a rock for shelter or something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've still got my tent, so, sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I shoved one in the haversack too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys continue for the next hour or so, skirting along the forest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I gathered some stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As they leave, Caleb scooches Frumpkin on the head and says: You know, she always forgets about you, but I do not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's such a quiet bird. I'm used to very loud birds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys gather some kindling, get back to your three horses and your comparatively uncomfortable riding arrangement, and continue on for another hour on the outside of the forest before the sun does eventually vanish. The graying sky is getting darker and darker, the faint bits of orange that poke through-- it's not a beautiful sunset, you only catch the faint hues that manage to push through the gloom, but the sky grows dark enough to the point where you think you should set up camp. Are you setting up camp at the edge of the forest, on the inside of the forest, on the outside of the forest, what's your preference?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Off inside, I think.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I think inside as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys set up camp. Who's keeping first watch?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll also do first watch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will begin it by putting out the silver thread around the group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys want to both individually roll perception or one aid the other? With the help action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Help action!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Individual.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Individual.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because I can't decide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Better than my 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh. Plus... three. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: and your eyes, even at this distance, catch a faint glimmer of matching flame. You see a faint bit of firelight sparkling about 200 feet deeper into the forest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's another... there's another campfire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 200 feet, give or take.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Uh...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want to send a bird, maybe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would send one of two things. One is our little friend here, or--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's sleeping.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or I... lose the peregrine and go back to something else a little less noticeable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd say go ahead. I figure if they were meaning us any harm they wouldn't set a fire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it's dark out now, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is dark, yeah. It's probably pushing 10:00, 10:30.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sighs) I would know if an owl-- Owls can see in the dark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Owls are nocturnal yes. You would know that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay. Okay. I'm going to change Frumpkin again, out of peregrine into an owl. I will mark that off on my supplies. I've got one more after this that I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We get a long rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And uh-- No, I mean I need incense but anyway--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have your long rests yet, so don't mark that yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I send Frumpkin tree to tree in that direction. Maybe, 20 feet and wait a moment and then another 20 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as Frumpkin begins to crawl through the forest in the direction of the fire, we're going to go ahead and take a break.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's almost nine o'clock so we're going to take a break.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are some changes and such so reminding you guys that moving forward we'll be doing the Wyrmwood giveaway at the Critical Role Twitch chat. So you need to head to twitch.tv/criticalrole for the break to enter. If you're watching on Alpha or Geek & Sundry just switch over and you can head on back over when you're done. Right now, the offer, once again, only stands for people in the US and Canada excluding Quebec because of weird giveaway rules and laws. However, tonight's prize is a Wyrmwood cherry dice tower with this fantastic cartography burned in of maps designed by our fantastic Deven Rue, who you may recognize, who's done the map of the Dwendalian Empire that we have here as well as other amazing bits and also designed the compass rose on our map. She's amazing. Her work's amazing and while this isn't available with Wyrmwood yet, keep an eye out because cool stuff like this might be showing up more often. So this will be given away to some lucky person in the break. Need to go into the Critical Role Twitch chat and enter only one time. Enter the key phrase "Kegstand." So enter it once. Magnets, it's magic. So enter it once; more than once, you'll be disqualified and we'll announce the winner here at the end of the break so we'll see you here in a few minutes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's cute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, which chat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Critical Role.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, cool. You've said that. You said that, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, everybody. We have our winner of our giveaway for this fantastic Deven Rue map-etched dice tower by Wyrmwood. It is GottaBeKD18. Congratulations, GottaBeKD18, you are the winner! Danoba will get your contact information and we'll get this sent out to you ASAP. Well done! You've won the first giveaway in the new studio. I am excited for you to try it out; it's quite delightful. All righty. Bringing us back into where we left off. Frumpkin wanders off through the darkened forest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (hooting)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, he's an owl now. He's so cute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One, two, three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mr. Owl was a dick. It was a dick move.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, it really was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One, two, three, fuck you. As Frumpkin begins-- [owl hooting]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What the fuck was that, Matt?! There was an owl that just hooted on the soundtrack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's better. Frumpkin slowly comes upon the warmth of this distant fire, closer and closer until coming around the corner, seeing a small fire heating a cauldron of some kind, some metal bowl. A bit of steam is rising off of whatever liquid is in the interior. You see an elderly woman in darker, tattered clothing that drapes off of the body, hunched but tall, very tall, like six and a half feet tall at a hunch. Make a perception check for Frumpkin, please, at this distance with disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Perception, you said? 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The skin of this woman is a faint gray color, almost a gray-blue tint. The hair is this matted mess of tangled white and gray that is pulled back and tied behind the head where it cascades over the shoulders. The ears are long and pointed, out to the sides a bit. The nose is wide and pressed up into the face. She is going back and forth from this little hovel that's on the opposite side, that's built between two trees: a large thick one and another that seems to have fallen and come to rest at an angle next to it. In that small cranny between the two trees, you can see this little hut built of thatch and sticks and rope to construct this little home. It's almost like an arch that's holding it up. Near the ground of this cauldron, you see a child of some kind that is sitting on the ground, holding knees to its chest. It looks to be a boy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Knees to chest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. She is paying him no mind at the moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment, no. It looks like she is going to and from this little homestead and putting things into this cauldron.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I whisper in fragments what I saw through Frumpkin's eyes the whole time, but I'm still looking and I can't hear anybody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have any awake?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is reminding me of stories that my mother told me when I was very young. Not good ones, things to scare me into following the rules. I come out of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A child?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And a woman, or not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That does have a vibration, doesn't it? I'm not at my best right now. If they're human, even if they're friendly, I'm not the first face you'd want to see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quickly. Have to think here, because everyone else is sleeping and that didn't look good for that little boy, but then it doesn't really help us with what we are doing, but then the child. What to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have a friendly owl.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I go back into Frumpkin to see what's going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You watch now as the woman takes a small clay cup and dips it into this cauldron and pulls out this steaming mass of liquid that she's contained within it, turns to the child, walks over and kneels down beside. Places the long fingers along the shoulder and hands the cup to the child. The child takes it, looking at her, and slowly sips from it. Burns the mouth a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I swat at Molly and say: Wake the others.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fine. I start quietly waking.

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: What? What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I somehow woke everyone at the exact same time. It's one of my many powers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were all spooning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Left hand, right hand, tail. I got it all working at once. We've got a bit of a situation outside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to require some delicacy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Caleb gone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Caleb's dead. It's all over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're looking at him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I didn't know if he was a phantom or something.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's going on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a boy, there's an old woman.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not sure, but I think there is a young child that's in danger there. We seemed to care about the bird child, maybe we care about this one. I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why do we give a shit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a baby.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ah, fuck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got to act right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What does the woman look like?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to groggily stumble over, put on my googles as I start stumbling towards the light.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She looked dead. She did not look natural.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to stay 30 feet behind and try and stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beauregard, you're leading up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to walk and I'm like: It's bright enough, and I got to pee anyway. I'll be right back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So not stealthing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe you should not go first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, no, I'll stealth a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a stealth check, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. That was almost good. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who else is following Beau?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to not follow, but go off to the side and try to go around the other way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth check from you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have not had a short rest yet, have we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, just checking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A short rest? I thought we did, back at the house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A short rest-- You didn't call it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But he was on first watch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I happily went, "I get to use arcane recovery" in my head because of the conversation that was happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will allow a short rest before you guys went to bed. It's fine, I'll allow it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you have branched off and are stealthing, you think. What are you doing, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wanted to go with Nott, about 20 feet behind, and cast Mage Armor as I go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and what's your stealth check?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is a big ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What are you doing, Keg?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I pick up my battleaxe and there's a little medallion hanging from the bottom of it and I look at it and I go: Goddamn it, and I try to stealth after them. Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have disadvantage, however, in your armor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That die never does that for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You did this last time. You're not human!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The anti-Wheaton has been found.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't come back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can never touch Wil Wheaton, or you guys will cancel each other out like the bad guy in Time Cop. Oh my god. Strangely, the stealthiest of all of you is the dwarf in plate armor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Amazing. It's lubricated with all the blood of her enemies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. All right, Molly, you're staying 30 feet back?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's (counting) 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all slowly begin to approach this fire, seeing the shapes and the figures described by Caleb previously. Beau, you step forward and your foot catches an under root and stumble for a moment. You hear the scrambling of her arms across the bottom of the forest floor, the moving and shifting of leaves and branches. The old woman looks up in that direction and looks back at you, immediately making eye contact with you about 30 feet away. Her arms immediately jump up in your direction as she begins to shout, "You! You will not take any more of us! I will sooner die!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I reach back out to her and I go: Yes, right?! We are so going to die. I'm with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel some sort of magical force suddenly penetrate your mind, and this sparkle of colors begin to spray in front of your face that completely distract you and obscure your vision momentarily, but you blink out of it and find the effect drift off of your brain. The old woman goes "(panting)," and reaches down and puts herself in front of the boy, between you and the child.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That I'm aware of, right? What bad guys are you talking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, that's craziness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's in the middle of nowhere. Okay, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her immediate tension drops slightly. She's still maintaining a very defensive position in front of the child. One hand is still up, but it seems that she's pulled back a bit from the aggressive stance she was previously in. As she lifts her face a bit, you can see a bit more of her expression in the light as the hair pulls away as she lifts her chin. You can see that the face is humanoid, but with a wider nose. The skin is grayish, almost a blue tint, with bits of a soft fur. It takes you a second to recognize where you've seen these features before. This appears to be the same type of race that Pumat Sol is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Firbolg?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a firbolg.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see there is a series of necklaces that looks to be bones and rocks and stones that have been polished that dangle around her neck as adornments and trinkets. A few bird skulls hanging on it, as well. The child, also you see, is a young firbolg, as well. Knees tucked against his chest. You can see that the child looks scraped up and bruised, and appears to have been injured.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say, Bad guys kidnapping kids, right? That's scary stuff. Trying to protect your son?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not my son, but we have lost a few, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks past you, for a second, to Molly, who is not being stealthy, either. "How many are you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One, two, three, four, five--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Currently five--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Five!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But just call us the Nein. The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here, M. Nein? (whistles)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just walking out at this point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll slowly emerge from the shadows.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm staying in the forest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. "I apologize, I've been on edge for a number of days. You seem to know these people or "have heard of them at least?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've lost a few recently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry. I am Jumnda. I'm a healer in my aged years for the Guiatao Clan. We are small in "number and, now, yet smaller still."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Guitaya Clan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guiatao.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guai--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: G-U-I-A-T-A-O.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guiatao Clan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This little one is Umbo. He is awake now, which is good fortune. I've been trying to bring "him back to health for a couple of days."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You say he's not your son, but part of your clan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, he is under my care now."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is the whole clan wiped out? Who's left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nila went off to find them alone. I begged her to stay, else she join their fate, but it's "impossible to stop a mother when the child is in danger. So I fear for her life but I understand "her drive. So here I am, here he is, and a few survivors care to what remains of our village a "ways back that direction." She points deeper into the forest. "So, you know my story, what's yours?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Other half of our party members were taken from us in the middle of the night, just last night. Seems very similar ways, considering neither of the rest of us heard anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just woke up and they were gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They were lucky."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Had you been awake, you might have had the urge or instinct to defend them."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we're making our way to see if something can be done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you're as brave as Nila."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nila? She's the one going after them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She was. I don't know where she is or if she has fared well-- if they've found her. I think she overestimates her capability."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was her son's name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Her son was Dua."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I do an insight check just to make sure that she's telling the truth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Whispers?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, D&D Beyond is a wonderful platform, in which you can organize your statistics and your equipment and they've just recently done a revamp of their layout. Liam, how do you like it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like it. It feels like I am looking at the paper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it's customizable!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's customizable. I haven't customized mine yet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're talking about D&D Beyond?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, Keg, we are.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I heard it's a wonderful service.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, if we indeed have an enemy in common, you are welcome to stay with us." And she glances across you. "I can perhaps maybe tend to some of your wounds. We have tea that's ready that may "help you in your journey ahead."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I genuinely don't know how to say no to tea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You couldn't bring a horse back from the dead, could you? Just didn't know how far your abilities stretch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm afraid that is beyond my capability."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can't heal a dead horse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Water Closet's gone forever--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Downtrodden.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He saved our lives a lot. (laughing) Downtrodden.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stop! (whispering) Bastard.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Keg comes out from the forest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! I forgot you were with us!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks a lot, Nott! What are we doing here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well these people have suffered the same fate that our frie--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We going to help every single person we see along this road?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're mutually-- We're going after the same people that have affected them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (yelling) We were going to camp back there, but instead we are going to camp over there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's Caleb. He always stands about 20 feet back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (yelling) At least!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, if there are more of you, they are welcome as well. I do not know if I have enough "tea for everyone if there is more, but--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm feeling all right, but--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just the five Neins.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So you're just offering us a place to stay? You don't want anything out of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some people are just good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some people make tea. I'm going to head in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you do anything about this acid burn? And I sit down next to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I see that you have encountered some of the ankheg variety."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! They are called ankhegs, you guys!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Related to you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, Nott. Keep trying, you little detective. You'll get it one day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The subject seems to be exhibiting signs of distress, or at least annoyance.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Annoyance!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather over to their space. It's a nice, lived-in space. You get the sense this is the home for this medicine woman, who doesn't live directly with the rest of the village. She inspects your wounds, has some balms and natural remedies to help prevent infection. The tea, while it is not necessarily delicious by any means-- it is very herbal and medicinal-- it does fill you with a sense of rest and relief, and what restlessness you may have been struggling with through a night's rest is absolved.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Chamomile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys manage to say here for the evening, you get the benefits of a long rest. You come to consciousness. Now in the morning day, which is a little more peaceful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have cards. We could have played cards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You awaken. Over by the fire the little boy, Ombo, is sitting there, currently with these two small wooden pikes that are jammed into the side and some squirrel-like critters that are hanging on them that are put towards the fire, cooking. As you awaken, Ombo turns and smiles. Doesn't say anything, but looks over and inspects them and then brings them back and hands them out to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's breakfast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will definitely take some.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take one. Yes, thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you understand what I am saying? Do you speak? Is his ward awake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see her at the moment, but you do hear a bit of rustling in the actual little hovel in the tree archway.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I make a perception check around to make sure everything is copacetic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You notice that the horses have actually been brought closer. They've been hitched together to one of the local stumps, to the circle here. It seems that in your rest, your very deep rest through the evening, a lot of things have been tended to and taken care of in your presence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They've got turn-down service here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As part of your long rest, and the tea which you took in the evening, you do have advantage on perception checks for the next eight hours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I bring Frumpkin-- without saying a word, telepathically, I have Frumpkin come down in front of the child, and do a little owl nonsensical shimmy dance on the ground, just for ten seconds, to catch his attention, then have Frumpkin flutter up and land on his head and gently find purchase and sit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He freezes on the arrival.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I smile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Steps up to the rest of you. "I see you have awoken. I know you'll be on your way shortly, but "maybe this can help." She pulls back the top of the leather pack and reaches in, and pulls out a cluster of moss that has been dried, and holds it out to whoever's closest or wishes to take it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mollymauk will take that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does it do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Should you find yourself in a wounded state, this should help you with some rapid "recovery of the wounds." It acts as a greater healing potion, but it takes a minute to administer, so it's a non-combat scenario.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you smoke it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, it is crumbled and then ingested. You can also put some in the actual wounds, if you "like, but it is meant for ingestion."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: See? People are just nice sometimes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Never in my experience.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Only sometimes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you know which way this friend of yours was heading to find them? It was north on the path, I suppose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just north is what I know. North, northeast?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see what we can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you find her and whatever state you find her... if it's not a good state, will you promise "me to at least bring her back so we can give her a proper burial?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This ain't part of my deal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it's possible we'll see what we can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all I can ask."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All things being equal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I look at the kid. Is he freaked out by the way I look? Is he--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not at all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go down and try something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does have a giant owl on his shoulder and is currently preoccupied with the owl.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try this. I haven't tried this yet. I'm going to hold up the moon card, and I'm going to try and do a sleight of hand trick and flip it to one of my little moon trinkets, moon baubles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh. Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would be the most hilarious natural one-- eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight? Okay. It happens but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not beautiful yet--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The trick is very visible, what you did, the kid still seems amused.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I give him the bauble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Smiles. Frumpkin ruffles his feathers, looks a bit spooked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I give him a little scratch. The horses?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, we should keep going to find their friends.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you for hopefully doing some good in a very dark world."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well. Dark business at hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know someone named Pumat Sol?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uh... that does not ring a bell?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about one of his friends Pumat Sol or Pumat Sol or Pumat Sol?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I apologize, I do not."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just thought maybe they knew each other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They all know each other.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? I'm--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know a goblin named Furgle Burgle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys gather your things, get the horses ready, Ombo approaches and gives a little wave. You watch as Jumma approaches from behind and rests her hand on his shoulder. Looks up to you and says, "Please, be safe."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll try. Thank you. Man, normally Fjord is here to do this part.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that was really good!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did very well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is the best you ever did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. that does feel good. I did something today.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were nearly charming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Charming adjacent?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. We leave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As we leave, Frumpkin's head does that crazy owl thing that goes 180 and flips around and just looks as--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you vanish into the treeline, Ombo the child seems transfixed by the owl's behavior before disappearing behind the trees, and you guys find your way back to the open fields of the northern Marrow Valley. So. Now back on horseback, what pace are you traveling at? Are you still going at a fast pace?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are well-rested.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've already lost two of our horses, why not lose a few more?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're the Three Amigos is really--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now all of us know-- ooh I went Vax. All of us know, what you already knew, which is-- yes, still hurts-- that these people are terrible. And deserve no mercy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not the firbolgs we just met, right? You were talking about the people who kidnapped our friends.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you think?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think-- we're still talking about the people who kidnapped our friends.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everybody's doing so much better suddenly. It's as if the vacuum means other people have to start pulling some slack. It's nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well suddenly you're being kind of charismatic. Nott's making moralistic judgments that are in the direction of reasonable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
