lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, there's no way to know. If you go on the third, then you might be less likely to be seen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or the first one would be more engaged with us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Or that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did I give you a scroll of Invisibility?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, who has that shit? Yeah, you do, don't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you're invisible, you could maybe help get everybody out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could you use it on me? Or would that ruin your books?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it won't ruin my books, it's just. I would only be able to use it this one time, then it's gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because you haven't transcribed it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any paper? Yeah. It would be gone either way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You wouldn't be able to commit it to memory and then rewrite it later?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're out of paper?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sighs) No, I mean, I do have a very near-perfect memory.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But it's near-perfect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Near-perfect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you're out of paper?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long does Invisibility last?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An hour?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it lasts for an hour, or until--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, but it's a scroll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell. But it'll last for an hour concentration, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm popping out of my German accent. If I cast a concentration spell and then I use a scroll, does it drop the concentration check on--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes it does. It's still you concentrating on the spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think Slow is more beneficial than Invisibility.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure, but if you use the scroll once we hear the bells, then we've got an hour. Your trap goes off, your little alarm goes off, Invisibility, then you wouldn't drop Invisibility, that's not concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, then fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can only have one or the other.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When is the trap going off? When does the alarm go off?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When they cross the finish line. I've set a silver thread across the road and if they move through that-- Anyone but us who walks through that line will set it off and I will hear.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But they won't hear?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no, no. It's in here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And how many feet ahead did you set that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wanted to do--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like 500--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I wanted to do more than that. Let's say 200 yards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Meters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like this plan. It's ridiculous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So are we doing Invisibility or no?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys happy to pull the trigger on this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to kill them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your placements. You've set the scene. The evening requires some rest, if you're to prepare for this by the morrow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I need to rest, I'm exhausted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you set up a small camp here, without light? Without fire?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To confirm, step one is tree goes down on cart one, if it's that way, right? Slow happens, you can get a sneak attack in if it's an ambush.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not going to attack, I'm just going to jump on a cart in the fracas and try to find a cage or two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And everyone else is going to start whaling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On people. On magic users.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that was a blonde pixie cut and a half-orc? A bald half-orc?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The sorcerer is the half-elf.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There we are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's my voice, Ashly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's so beautiful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Up there, in bush land, are you going to be able to do anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I can move 40 feet, my speed. I'm pretty quick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But that would get you on the cart with the bad guys. You can't just rain down terror from above?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's true, are any of us doing ranged attacks?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not ranged people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm ranged.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got some pretty dope mobility.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And you can do stuff once Slow's cast, you can also do other things once it's rolling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, I can dispel any magical stuff going on in the cages shortly after, or improvise and switch to long range destruction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If things look like they're trouble, we'll just go with it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, the plan will fuck up I'm sure, but we will scrap through, or die. Rather than choose who we're going to attack in the moment, I saw through my owl the half-orc with his hood down is a bald man. I would say let's look for that one first.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's the leader, that's Lorenzo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's Liam, not Caleb. Everyone else was hooded, so we don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think Lorenzo is going to be a problem, because he has reach, and he's a leader.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would say then that whichever one reveals them first, either half-orc or woman with a pixie cut, whoever reveals themself first, we'll say that is the one that we all target at the same time. We focus our attention to one and kill them, and they are out of the picture, instead of splitting between two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we find that half-orc, druids tend to have healing abilities.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, but if they don't reveal themselves first--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just saying, if they reveal themselves at the same time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Go for the druid first?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Correct. That's wise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. That'll do. We've got a plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're setting up camp without fire for the evening? Or are you lighting a fire for warmth?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like we shouldn't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we shouldn't, either.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll huddle together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We share body warmth by all spooning in a chain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do set up the tent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You set up the tent behind the hill. You spoon for warmth.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I hate it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's Lucky Pierre? Who's in the middle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aren't we all?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably Mollymauk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm very cold, but yeah, that'll work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you take a moment, Caleb, the bells go off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're already here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Up, up!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I still have the dodecahedron?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, if you want. You would have to redo it again. Whoever wants to do it has to do it now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I toss it to Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I look in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys aren't treating it like a--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's totally whippets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whippets from Xhorhas. This is great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, every time it's magical and very special.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) "You got the touch!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anytime Caleb does it, he sees all timelines, but in the interest of brevity--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are in your places, the first cart comes up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we really doing this now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we go, I'm going to whisper to Caleb: Caleb, if anything goes shitty, I'm going to throw my flask of oil on the first cart. Light it on fire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Understood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As this one comes through, you notice the person who's guiding it is your friend, Protto.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Clarota?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Protto.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wrong timeline.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one begins to continue forward, and this pushes forward as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit! I'm so scared.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me too. I'm so scared.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold me, Ashly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the sides of this, there is the half-orc druid. That's Dwelma, and Ruzza, who's the half-elf.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's the sorcerer. These are the two magic users.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the back is the small singular cart that's being ridden by one figure, and there, helming the end, is Juam, the human rage-filled warrior, the one that you've had the better experience with.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The barbarian is a human?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Pushing forward until about there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, Keg.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Am I doing this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you doing this?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm felling the tree? Okay. Is this a strength check?

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: (chanting) Keg, Keg, Keg!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a strength check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That is an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tree immediately falls forward off the side, snapping at where it was left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did you have that? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to give Protto an attempt to try and dodge out of the way. He succeeds with a dexterity saving throw, because he's quite dexterous. He jumps back into the front of the cart, and you watch his lower half vanish as he stops there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I revealed, or am I hidden by the stump?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. Actually, that's a valid point. I'm going to have you guys all roll stealth checks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With advantage, because we had time?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In advance, you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'll say in advance.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I at disadvantage? I'm not moving, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, Vax die, yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The axel snaps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was my trigger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, the carts back up at this point. There's a shout in the back and you hear Protto go like, "Boss, what is--" At which point, you're doing what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 40-foot cube.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First, for the sake of order here, because we are engaging in a series of aggressive actions, let's all roll initiative, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! Is that cocked? I can't tell if that's cocked. I need a ruling from-- oh, it fell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Add my boots.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pretty good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Miss the Percy mega-initiative?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. I didn't even really understand how good I had it. I was so used to being okay no matter what, even if I rolled a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to sit down for this one real fast, write it down. 25 to 20, anybody?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so glad you're first. That's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau and Nott up first. 20 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, you said, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, vierzehn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A lot of bad guys there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Evil party, evil party.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you get?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Eight. I'm rolling poop on initiative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, don't leave! We might be ending now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before any reaction happens, though, you do get your action. You are casting Slow, you said?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Indeed I am. Molasses goes across my hand and I draw my hand down through the air, and I focus on these four, if I can. It's a 40-foot cube, putting this one in a corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many can you target with this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Up to six in a 40-foot cube.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to six? That'll be quite a lot. You can get all of these guys, if you want to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, let's see, because it's (counting) 40, yeah. This whole section here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you know, fuck it. Let's also get this horse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's six people there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, there's six of them? Oh, wow, yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the one who's helming this horse, the one who's helming these horses, the back of the cart, and then those four.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, never mind. I didn't think we were getting all of those people. Good. All of the humanoids.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the two thugs that are on the horses, two and a three. Natural two and a three. They are both slowed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What does Slow mean, by the way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Half speed, negative two to armor class, no reactions, and they can either do an action or a bonus action; they can't do both.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, that's amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They can attempt to cast a spell, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That means you can attack and then disengage for free. That's amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ruzza does not succeed. Ruzza is slowed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ruzza, the sorcerer! Did the druid save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The druid does save. The barbarian-- the barbarian does not save.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The druid saved, Dwelma.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Lorenzo-- that is a 17. Saves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's pretty dope, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This all happens. Combat has begun. Starting at the top of the combat order: Beau, you're up first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, Nott is. Nott rolled a 21 and I rolled a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! Got you. I put them in the wrong order.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're starting this? I don't know how I'm going to get on this fucking cart! How am I going to get on this cart? I'm not invisible!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your charisma, Sam! Your charisma.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll run past Lorenzo. As I run, I will dump all my oil on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's your action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep, that's my action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (splashing) He looks at it, sees you dart by.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action disengage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He can't make an attack of opportunity on you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And jump into the cart and start doing this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This big one there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You dart in, and as soon as your vision comes through, you come face-to-face with a metal cage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there in front of you. For you who can watch, the back half of Nott is still visible. The entire cart is filled with cages. Front to back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're invisible cages?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cages are blanketed by some sort of illusion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The part of me that hit the cage is now invisible also?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, but just the front half. It looks like Nott vanishes partway through, like you've stepped through part of a doorway. On the inside, you see a very sweaty human man who is gagged and leaned up against the cage like, (whines). He looks up towards you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all I've got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all you've got.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you get a little bit more around the-- or is that all your movement?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sure I pushed as far as I could.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm probably more than 40 feet away from the druid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) You do have to get down there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sweet jump.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, this is what you live for!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is what I live for! Ten!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to land without losing your footing. You get right up to the druid there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, fuck. Okay. Two attacks. First attack, okay! That's a natural 16, plus seven is 21. Right? 16 plus seven?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 21, and that's eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to spend a ki point to do Stunning Strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a natural 15 plus three is 18.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That really sucks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got ball bearings!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do have ball bearings. Take my second hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's 20 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 total? Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Another eight damage. I'm going to spend another ki point to try Stunning Strike again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that, plus three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. What's the DC?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a perfect plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm burning through so many ki points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's now or never.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to spend one more ki point to do Patient Defense because I'm probably going to need it now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, going into defensive mode. That finishes Beau's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three ki points! Burning them out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ki questions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It's now Ruzza's turn, who is slowed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you attempt to cast a spell with a casting time of one action--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't go off until the next turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, Slow is the best!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ruzza's going to step back, looking towards Lorenzo, and goes, "Boss, this is so weird." It's weird to hear this slowed-down, deeper voice coming out of this female half-elf, but nevertheless, here we are. As she steps away and begins-- She does give a bit of bardic inspiration to Lorenzo, because she's technically not a sorcerer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not a sorcerer?! You got it wrong!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as much as you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that a bonus action, though? You have to do an action or a bonus action, you can't do both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right! So they're not doing that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Read the cards, people! Read the cards!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No dubstep today. No wub wub.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still saying that phrase, but not in an inspirational way. Is going to cast, glancing over in your direction as the source of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Knew where I was? My stealth was that shitty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once you cast the spell you reveal yourself, buddy. That's how it works, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The cover of bush?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's bushman!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we had him all bushed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to die. It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be-- Yeah, let's do some Hypnotic Pattern. Why not?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He'll resist it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He begins (slow incantation) and slowly backs to here, getting up on the hill, climbing to get some better visual perspective over the battlefield. That's going to end Ruzza's turn, Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I look at Keg and: You got that one?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got 30 feet of movement. I can get almost to the edge of this mountain, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 30 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 30 feet there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then I can teleport how far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I get to flanking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flanking? To there, you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that way more than-- I have a 30 foot teleport, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it possible to do it halfway through my movement so I still have two steps that I can take? No, never mind. Eff it, I'm good. I'm not going to fight it. I'm going to take two attacks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I assume you had your rites prepared.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Both are up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, motherfucker!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's 19. Yeah, that hits. The first one is awful: seven points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage? All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Second one is 16, 17, yeah, that's 16 plus seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's better. 12 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. That brings us to Lorenzo. Hmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, we stumped him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, so quiet!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The only good plan that we've ever made is without Travis and Laura here. Let's make that clear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still stoked on our-- was it Umbrasyl? The frost dragon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was pretty solid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you doing a throwback right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I am.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vorugal was the frost. Umbrasyl was black acid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When Vorugal fought Yenk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lorenzo, watching you and your friends, shouts out in your direction and goes--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slowed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, he's not slowed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, he saved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end his turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's casting!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can cast?! I thought you said he was a fighter! Your information is the worst!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm not very smart!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Protto is currently like freaking out by this, sees this all happening, narrowingly missed the tree slamming into him, goes and pulls out his bow and nocks an arrow into it and is going to take a shot. Let's see, the one he saw dart that way's going to be Molly. He's going to fire at Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's going to have a hard time doing that. Disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of my Blood Maledict?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's see. I'm not looking at the right thing. Where is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it a 30 or 60 foot range?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Blood Maledict!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For your Blood Curse of the Eyeless?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's 60 feet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60 feet? Yeah, that'll do it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Amplified.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Amplified, so disadvantage on-- He gets two strikes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Five points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First one with disadvantage is going to be 16 to hit? What's your armor class?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For fuck's sake! 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, so that hits. Because you're adjacent to an ally of his, he gets sneak attack bonus on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God fucking damn it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rogues are the worst.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to put him--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slash the best!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a total of 14 points of piercing damage from the first arrow into your shoulder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one is going to be--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did he get disadvantage on the other attack as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He did, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, on this one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it was an 11 and a ten he rolled and it's plus six on his attacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so they both hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the other one just deals six points of piercing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that wasn't damage. I thought that was damage, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to jump off and move over here, up onto the top to get a good view since he's a ranged guy with his arrows. He's keeping down and getting ready for that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I ran over there. I'm fighting the druid!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you ditched. That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to go ahead and-- that was his action surge and everything, so he's done. Next up. Bear with me, guys. There is a lot going on right here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, there's 12 players.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're back to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you had the ambush round technically because it was the trigger, Slow, and then everything happened at once. The tree triggered the ambush seeing you, so the only one who got a round off was you for the spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Dispel Magic on the cages or I could attack the person about to attack me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's going to attack you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I would do. I will use the Glove of Blasting to fire on the person attacking me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The one on the hill.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The one on the hill.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The sorcerer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it. Roll for attacks on that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, three of those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Minus two to their armor class.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First one does not hit, that is a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goes wide.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second is-- Sorry. 17?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it was 16 on the last one! Does that hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would hit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a two plus eight, that's ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so two hits. It's 4d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not a bad opening round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They have to make a constitution save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. To maintain?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, they were casting an attack. Well, I don't know what they were casting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They still have to make a concentration check to see if they can finish with their casting, yeah. That is a 13 plus two. That is a 15. So yeah, they're fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, they're fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that the end of your turn, Caleb? Staying where you are?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will lie down flat on my back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! You go prone? Caleb goes prone. Okay, now it's the thugs' turn. They are slowed, so they can't move too far. This one is going to move back. That's as far as he can move, and he's going to pull out his crossbow and he gets one shot, because of the Slow spell. He's going to take it towards you, Caleb, with disadvantage because you're so far away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: MATT; Yeah, you're still within the minimum distance, so with disadvantage regardless. That is, with disadvantage, a 13. What's your armor class?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shield. It doesn't hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bolt goes wide. This guy here is also slowed. He's going to attempt to back away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do the horses get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They do not. He's going to attempt to use the edge of the tree for some cover as he takes a shot at Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. And that is going to be a 13 again!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're still alive!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it is Juam's turn, who is slowed, and right here, next to Caleb, is going to take a strike at you. Not technically-- only gets one attack, so the first one would've been 12.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I used my reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you did! That's right, you do not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I still have a second Blood Maledict, by the way, this round? I can spend another round doing it. I know we changed the rules slightly. At fifth level, do I get two uses or just two options?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll have to double check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. When we get there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the two thugs' turns. That's Juam's turn. Keg, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, Keg! Kill them all in one turn! From 45 feet away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like narratively, Keg is actually pretty freaked right now. Is it weird to ever give yourself disadvantage on things narratively?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it makes sense! We've all done it to some degree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's Sam's raison d'être.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to give myself disadvantage on everything I'm going to try to do this turn, because seeing Lorenzo again I think has really freaked Keg out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He is covered in oil, which makes him kind of sexy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm aroused and scared?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, the armor that Lorenzo is wearing-- you've seen it before. It's studded leather, but it's straps and hooks. The theme of it resembles very much elements of his profession, or at least reminding you what he does. So the oil weirdly does make it strangely erotic. It's your turn, you have 25 feet of movement, so that'll only get you about five squares of movement.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to run. I'm going to run--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Away?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus. Ugh, you're the worst!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm roleplaying!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you running towards the action or away from it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll run towards this-- no, I'm going to run towards those horses. I'm going to run that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check to leap down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Terrible. Awful. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you lose the last five feet of movement. That's your movement there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My javelin can't go very far, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your javelin has a pretty decent range. Does it have the ranges next to it in the app? That's okay, I have it here. The javelin-- it's 30 and 120 feet. So it can go 30 feet without disadvantage and 120 feet with disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you said everything's at disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you might as well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Might as well, yeah. So is Protto within 120 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Protto is. Right up there on the hill, getting his arrows nocked.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I hate him definitively, so I'm going to throw at Protto. With disadvantage. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Completely passes over.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can use my bonus action to move again? Or no, I can't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you can't. That's where you are. You can take another javelin attack, because you have three javelins.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll try again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get one more swing at him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. Doesn't work. That's terrible. I won't even bother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both javelins miss. You're shaken by this experience.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did throw two javelins at an irritating creature, so that's good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get the nerves out. Get the nervousness out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now Dwelma's turn. Dwelma is going to cast Dispel Magic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does that mean I get to take an attack on her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not unless you have the War Caster--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mage Slayer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mage Slayer, I mean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I almost took that. Took Sentinel instead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: SAM; What do you cast Dispel Magic on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The magical effect, which is the Slow effect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it will do it over all of the--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it's any spell third level or lower, the target ends, so Slow fades.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck! That's why I was trying to stun her! I think she still could have done it, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, and is going to run. So you both get attacks of opportunity on her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get an attack of opportunity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not very good at all. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 is not going to hit! Not with Barkskin, sorry. Actually, no! She doesn't have Barkskin because of the ambush. She hasn't had time to cast it, so it's an AC of 11. You do hit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? She doesn't move anywhere!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is stuck there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well actually, no. Can you freeze her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's not moving. She can't move and she takes five damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's still between the two of us. She couldn't have circled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she circled around. It's when she leaves the range, so she gets stuck there. That ends her turn. Now Lorenzo's turn's going to trigger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What the fuck is that?! He's a dragon-man?! What is this?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What is happening?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is huge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus! What the fuck is that?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. That's your call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it just misses you. It's right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's why I go far away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What the fuck?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a Cone of Cold bursts forth from-- (whooshing) Lorenzo smiles as his friends have come out of the way, and this burst of freezing cold arcane energy swirls in front of him, flash-freezing everything in front, including the cart, actually.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So Nott gets frozen too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott has to make a reflex save. Beau and Molly have to make-- sorry, dexterity save. Oh, that's a relic!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what? I'll use my luck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, don't get frozen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Terrible!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no, what was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, buddy. All right. Okay. What did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, okay. Nott, you take 41 points of cold damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll halve that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you use your reaction to halve that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you say, I'm sorry, 41? Four-one? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, you take-- that would be 20 points of cold damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jesus Christ.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you take 20 points of cold damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20 points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. As it triggers and the frost finishes off in the space there, Lorenzo, grinning, looks over his shoulder back at Keg and goes like, "Am I going to have to make a lesson here?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, he's winning!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I think I have to use an action to unlock this cage. To pick the lock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Make your lockpick check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck you! Five plus, I don't know. What is it usually, seven?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dex and proficiency, so it would be seven, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not enough. You spend a moment and the lock is not going. These are pretty intense cages, and you look over there, and Lorenzo's standing there with the glaive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to move around the cages or between them, so that I turn completely invisible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move through a very small gap, they're pushed up against each other. Make a strength check to see if you can push through; you might not be able to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope! That's a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't push through it; the cages are too close. The small gap there, you try to muscle it, but there are two to three people in each cage, and you can't push though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I use my bonus action to-- Jesus, what can I do for my bonus action? I can't hide. Can I hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could try, you're partially obscured.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So yeah, I will try to hide.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Lorenzo's eyeing him right now, you said?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go on the side of the cart and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lorenzo's eyeing in that direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll hide off the side of the cart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's wonderful. It's 29!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You appear, within your mind, to have vanished from the current sight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of at least Lorenzo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That brings us to, finishing Nott, Beau, your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh God! Damn, this fucking druid. I'm just going to lay into the druid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, first attack. Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, snap!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, Gil! That's doubling dice damage. Big money, come on! Six plus four: ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten damage. Oof, Dwelma's looking rough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second attack. 14 plus seven, so 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that would have gone off. So make your wisdom saving throw, if you don't mind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I don't mind at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May I ask a weird question, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The guy that I was trying to break out of the cage: is he alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing around the area, it looks like the people that were right on the outer edge of the cages are frozen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would I have seen that before I tried to unlock the cage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guy who's near you, he's fine. They blocked the impact there. It was your latter half that was sticking out that got blasted.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, all right, so the Hypnotic Pattern does not affect you. Well done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did 11 damage on my second attack on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Down like dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like unconscious and bleeding out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have any more attacks left?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have my bonus. Can I move and then attack again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or you could hit them while they're down and help them bleed out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought about that, but I have enough movement that I can make it to the barbarian, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you going to handle Lorenzo? Who's going to handle Lorenzo? (shouting) Who's going to handle Lorenzo? Fuck! I'm going to jump over the horses' asses and get to Lorenzo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get over the horses. Where are you going to stand, on the cart? There's not a lot of room here to stand to fight and you'd have to get over--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have 40 feet of movement, so wherever I can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say you can get back right here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, land on the horse's back!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I land on the horse's back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, why not?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now you're mounted!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're on the horse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm on a horse. Am I within range of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm in combat range of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hopefully that's useful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Ruzza. Ruzza, who watched the druid go down, sees you over there being really defensive and looks around. He's going to attempt to cast Hold Person at level three. I need Mollymauk and Beau to make wisdom saving throws please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Motherfucker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got this, guys. You got this. Big rolls!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Completely resists it. Shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Burned it! Burn that shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back up around the tree trunk there. That ends her turn. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no way to get through--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for sticking with us. I know this is going late, but I want to see how this turns out. We've been gone for two weeks. Consider it a bonus episode.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no way I can make it to Lorenzo from here, is there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's possible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can climb over the cart if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get my ass kicked if I get there. I'm going to try and engage the barbarian before raging happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God damn it. Fuck it, if you're in with Lorenzo, I'm going for Lorenzo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an acrobatics check to try and get over the cart without issue.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten? You lose some movement, but you still have enough to get right there. That's as close as you get. Lorenzo's technically supposed to be in that space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take three attacks. I do not have advantage, obviously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First attack. Is that cocked or is that okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it your big dice? It's cocked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it! It was a 20. Now it's a 22.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take your damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's (counting) 18 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not happy. Swipe number two. That's a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten does not hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then the other one is a three. That does not hit either.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That first strike carves past. You see blood spatter across the edge of the hillside. Lorenzo's like, "All right, I see what you're doing. One for one." Slams the glaive onto the ground. That ends your turn, Molly. It is Lorenzo's turn. Lorenzo's going to go ahead and make two glaive attacks against you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I have a second Blood Maledict usage now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still level five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. I was looking, because I know you changed things, and it says "Blood Maledict: "You can invoke a blood curse a number of times per short rest based on your levels. 2nd one, 5th two, "9th three." I'm taking-- hoping this die rolls worse, come on. For fuck's sake! My Blood Maledict literally kills me. Actually, no, fuck, was I going to do it advanced? I was going to do it advanced. My own Blood Maledict knocks me unconscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You get knocked unconscious?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was at four hit points. What was I going to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not that!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god, is he still going to attack you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First hit. You guys watch as Molly falls back unconscious, Lorenzo looks confused. His vision still obscured, the blindness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I flanking Molly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first strike slams down into Molly's chest, the blade actually sinking about seven inches into the chest. Blood spatters out of your mouth. You can use your reaction to make an attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can, as Sentinel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Sentinel you can, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 does not hit, so it misses there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lorenzo looks back over towards Keg. Looks up at you, Beau, and says, "An example it is." Molly, in the brief moments of consciousness, what do you want to be your last words?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I say: Wait!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's in it? It's done?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you get a reaction? Do you have anything?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe I could talk to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, you have a brief moment. As the consciousness and life leaves you, what are your last words?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (spitting) With blood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it slams into his face, "Respect," and then twists the blade. The life leaves Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eyes never shut.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're looking over at this and you feel it deflect. No impact. Caleb, your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to hold my turn, and cast a Scorching Ray at the sorcerer the moment they do anything. First, I will get up off of prone, into a crouch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The thugs take their turn. Both of them are going to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I might need to leave the table for a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both going to back up and take two crossbow shots at Beau. You have your Patient Defense on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I can't watch this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is still a 16 and a 17 they rolled.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 16 misses, 17 hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right! First one, you deflect out of the air.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Catch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she already used her reaction. And the other one is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can still use Deflect Missiles, right, to lower it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You use your reaction to do it. But it rolled a 15 to hit. You, watching this happen, hear it deflected off. The other one you catch and drop, still looking down at Molly's not-moving body. As Lorenzo now grins back at you and says, "Is it time for another, or have you learned your lesson?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should know: I have no respect for authority.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then another life it is." All right, that ends thugs' turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm invisible!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does not see you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: As a quick reminder!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) You're the closest there. The barbarian goes pulling in, is going to use an action to move up into melee with you, but that's their turn. This is not looking good, guys. Which brings us to Keg. Keg, you've seen these situations before. What are you going to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I reach them with my speed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can you reach who?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Lorenzo and Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How close can I get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the tree there, about there is as close as you can get. You can use your action to move, but you wouldn't be able to do anything else.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I can talk to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. You move up over the log, and it gets you there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Stop. Just stop attacking them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's your turn. Dwelma's bleeding out. Nott, your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I do? Lorenzo hasn't been hit yet, has he?

lines.name: ASHLEY, MATT
lines.text: He got hit once.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Once, but he's not going to go down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's covered in shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear Keg shouting and mid-battle parleying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's the barbarian on Caleb, which is not good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will first try to use a bonus action to use item and pour acid on one of the locks. See if that opens it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You pour acid on the lock. It's going to take a moment. Acid isn't an immediate thing, if you're not going to splash it on somebody. It has to eat through metal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, shit. Then I won't do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would know that as an alchemist.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will-- Shit, what do I do? I can't kill anything here. I'm going to try the lock. I'm going to try the lock. there's nothing else I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think the signs are pointing in a direction. What are you doing, Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, so movement and bonus, I will run towards Caleb, but not directly at the barbarian.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a lot of time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, it's your turn. You see Nott run.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's see, movement is 30. How far could I have gotten with just movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With just your movement?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, okay. Yeah, so that's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you see Keg rushing to parley. What do you do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say: Hey Keg-- no wait, that's your name-- Hey Lorenzo, this one's for Beau-- no, fuck! I'm getting all my names fucked up because I'm so stressed out! This one's for Molly and Yasha, because we failed on this before. I'm going to get it right this time. I'm going to take my tinderbox and light it, and I'm going to-- right onto him, light him on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, he's going to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I'm touching him with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. He fails.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (flames erupting) Roll a d6 damage. He is on fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: d6 plus what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just d6 fire damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four points of fire damage. There's now flames curling off of his body. He's taking it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take my staff and pure brute anger, right across his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get out of there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whoosh) He's not even looking at you. He's looking at Keg.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has his attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 does hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Run!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take my movement and go towards Caleb and Nott. Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a reflex for him to go ahead and take an attack of opportunity on you with his glaive, and then he flickers and looks back to Keg, seeming more interested in what she has to say. That ends your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Ruzza's going to walk up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Didn't you have a thing held for the sorceress?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The moment she does anything. That depends on how you want to interpret that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The moment she does anything, what were you going to cast?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I meant do anything-- I guess do anything to hurt us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you're watching her very carefully-- She's going to do it. She's going to step up and cast Cure Wounds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Oh, it's a slave. They get a slave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're going to try and capture Molly?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it is Lorenzo's turn, because Molly doesn't have a turn. Lorenzo's looking at you and says, "Looks like we have an eye-for-an-eye scenario." Points off at Dwelma, who at this point has bled out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You say you want to be an example, huh?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Will you let them go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure." Puts his hand up, flames still curling up and burning his body, which, roll another d6.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Another four damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Use your teleport spell!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't have one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the warrior steps back, still burning, takes and leads you here. They begin to move forward and push the carts, begin to push the log off of this to the side, and the warrior woman grabs the front of the cart where the horses were and begins to drag it forward. As it begins to pull away--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Isn't one of them encased in ice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you do anything?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks at the three of you. "The Iron Shepherds have a reputation, and I expect you to "tell everyone you come across what happened here today, and what a mistake it is to turn against "us." Pulls the glaive back slowly and leans into your ear and says, "That's a bit too quick. I want "you to live with the memory of what you did today," and kicks you in the back and knocks you onto your face. Turns around, finally pats out the flames. "We're moving on! If I see any of your "faces again-- (chuckles) Well, at least you'll be able to see your friend on the other side."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck you, Lorenzo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (exhales)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fun guest star.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, Ash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uh, sorry!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good job, Ashly. Welcome to the game.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have destroyed the show.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Go ahead and see my way out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this is part of the game.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it wasn't all your fault, just mostly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a terrible convergence of events.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, bad shit happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bad shit happens to mediocre people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow. I'm going to sit down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's use this week to love each other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, don't ream us for all the things we probably did wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, please don't. Everyone here is playing the game as best they can in the moment, and honestly, a lot of it was dice swings and a lot of it was circumstantial, and this is how the game works. It's going to make for a great story, and will continue to, because you guys have one fucking villain now in your campaign. Oh, this is going to be delicious. Be kind to each other. We love you all very much. Let's take a week to remember Mollymauk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's nothing we can do to bring him back, is there? There's nothing we got.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not with what we got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not with what you got.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got another vial of acid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
